attributes.mlflow.spanInputs:
{"job_description": "Lead Customer Engineer
New York / Mountain ViewCustomer Experience – Customer Success /Full-Time /Hybrid
APPLY FOR THIS JOB
At ASAPP, our mission is simple: deliver the best AI-powered customer experience—faster than anyone else. To achieve that, we’re guided by principles that shape how we think, build, and execute. We value customer obsession, purposeful speed, ownership, and a relentless focus on outcomes. We work in tight, skilled teams, prioritize clarity over complexity, and continuously evolve through curiosity, data, and craftsmanship.

We’re seeking technologists and problem solvers who thrive in fast-paced environments, love collaborating with great talent, and approach every day like it’s Day 1. We're a globally diverse team with hubs in New York City, Mountain View, Latin America, and India—embracing both hybrid and remote work to bring the best minds together, wherever they are. If you're driven by continuous learning, rapid pivots, and the challenges of building in a high-growth startup, we’d love to talk. This is more than a job—it’s a journey.

Lead AI transformations as an L3/L4 Customer Engineer, driving GenerativeAgent implementations for the world's biggest brands. Our best Customer Engineers are relentless problem-solvers who know how to navigate the power of GenerativeAI to deliver real outcomes.

You'll own the AI agent building process during customer onboarding, partnering with junior engineers to deliver results. This role is for someone who digs into complex business problems, builds great AI solutions, and scales them to millions of users. You'll work closely with strategic customers as their AI advisor, taking a "do what it takes" approach to help them get maximum value from GenerativeAgent.

You'll partner with every team: Go-To-Market, Engineering, Product, and leadership—becoming a key source of customer insight that shapes our product roadmap.
What you'll do
Own customer implementations, bringing an entrepreneurial creativity and "do what it takes" urgency
Craft implementation strategy for complex enterprise environments
Build and optimize enterprise AI agents with customers—understanding their workflows, pain points, and goals
Work as strategic advisor with customer executive teams to define their AI roadmap
Run feedback loops with Engineering—influence features based on customer needs
Guide and mentor L1/L2 Customer Engineers in execution and customer thinking
Lead beta testing and drive adoption of new AI capabilities
What you'll need
5+ years of relevant experience (product manager, consultant, founder, engineer, etc.)
Deep technical skills—able to understand and shape complex AI agent designs
Strong communication and relationship-building skills with executive stakeholders
Comfortable working in fast-moving environments where you shape solutions and build them
Track record of driving business outcomes through technology
What we'd like to see
Computer Science, Engineering, or Math degree—or equivalent technical experience
Experience with Generative AI, Agentic AI, or conversational AI technologies
Background in product management, engineering, or technical leadership roles
Benefits
Competitive compensation with stock options
Comprehensive medical, vision, and dental insurance
401k matching
Fitness and wellness stipend
Mobile phone reimbursement
Mental well-being benefits
Professional learning and development stipend
Parental leave, including adoptive and foster parents
3 weeks paid time off (increases with tenure) and unlimited sick leave
ASAPP is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, age, or veteran status. If you have a disability and need assistance with our employment application process, please email us at careers@asapp.com to obtain assistance. #LI-SL1 #LI-Hybrid 
We may use artificial intelligence (AI) tools to support parts of the hiring process, such as reviewing applications, analyzing resumes, or assessing responses. These tools assist our recruitment team but do not replace human judgment. Final hiring decisions are ultimately made by h", "job_metadata": {"job_url": "https://jobs.lever.co/asapp-2/1fdfb7af-0676-49e4-8e2a-085bb74d2c5d"}, "status_id": "d134480385a843c1815859a871445e5a", "base_resume_pointers": null, "analyzed_requirements": null, "resume_sections": null, "validation_result": null, "generated_doc_path": "", "resume_url": "", "retry_count": 0, "error_message": "", "status": "processing"}

{"job_description": "Position: Lead Customer Engineer (L3/L4) — Locations: New York / Mountain View — Employment: Full-Time, Hybrid

Company mission: Deliver AI-powered customer experience. Seeking technologists to lead AI transformations and GenerativeAgent implementations for enterprise customers.

Responsibilities:
- Own customer implementations and onboarding for AI agent solutions.
- Craft implementation strategy for complex enterprise environments.
- Build, optimize, and scale enterprise AI agents with customers, understanding workflows and goals.
- Serve as strategic AI advisor to customer executive teams and define AI roadmaps.
- Run feedback loops with Engineering and influence product features.
- Guide and mentor L1/L2 Customer Engineers.
- Lead beta testing and drive adoption of new AI capabilities.

Requirements:
- 5+ years of relevant experience (e.g., product manager, consultant, founder, engineer).
- Deep technical skills to understand and shape complex AI agent designs.
- Strong communication and relationship-building skills with executive stakeholders.
- Ability to work in fast-moving environments and drive business outcomes through technology.

Preferred:
- Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Math or equivalent experience.
- Experience with Generative AI, Agentic AI, or conversational AI.
- Background in product management, engineering, or technical leadership.

Benefits:
- Competitive compensation with stock options; medical/vision/dental; 401k matching; wellness and learning stipends; mobile reimbursement; parental leave; 3 weeks PTO (increases with tenure) and unlimited sick leave.

Other notes in posting: ASAPP is an equal opportunity employer. They may use AI tools in the recruitment process. attributes.mlflow.spanInputs:
{"job_description": "Lead Customer Engineer
New York / Mountain ViewCustomer Experience – Customer Success /Full-Time /Hybrid
APPLY FOR THIS JOB
At ASAPP, our mission is simple: deliver the best AI-powered customer experience—faster than anyone else. To achieve that, we’re guided by principles that shape how we think, build, and execute. We value customer obsession, purposeful speed, ownership, and a relentless focus on outcomes. We work in tight, skilled teams, prioritize clarity over complexity, and continuously evolve through curiosity, data, and craftsmanship.

We’re seeking technologists and problem solvers who thrive in fast-paced environments, love collaborating with great talent, and approach every day like it’s Day 1. We're a globally diverse team with hubs in New York City, Mountain View, Latin America, and India—embracing both hybrid and remote work to bring the best minds together, wherever they are. If you're driven by continuous learning, rapid pivots, and the challenges of building in a high-growth startup, we’d love to talk. This is more than a job—it’s a journey.

Lead AI transformations as an L3/L4 Customer Engineer, driving GenerativeAgent implementations for the world's biggest brands. Our best Customer Engineers are relentless problem-solvers who know how to navigate the power of GenerativeAI to deliver real outcomes.

You'll own the AI agent building process during customer onboarding, partnering with junior engineers to deliver results. This role is for someone who digs into complex business problems, builds great AI solutions, and scales them to millions of users. You'll work closely with strategic customers as their AI advisor, taking a "do what it takes" approach to help them get maximum value from GenerativeAgent.

You'll partner with every team: Go-To-Market, Engineering, Product, and leadership—becoming a key source of customer insight that shapes our product roadmap.
What you'll do
Own customer implementations, bringing an entrepreneurial creativity and "do what it takes" urgency
Craft implementation strategy for complex enterprise environments
Build and optimize enterprise AI agents with customers—understanding their workflows, pain points, and goals
Work as strategic advisor with customer executive teams to define their AI roadmap
Run feedback loops with Engineering—influence features based on customer needs
Guide and mentor L1/L2 Customer Engineers in execution and customer thinking
Lead beta testing and drive adoption of new AI capabilities
What you'll need
5+ years of relevant experience (product manager, consultant, founder, engineer, etc.)
Deep technical skills—able to understand and shape complex AI agent designs
Strong communication and relationship-building skills with executive stakeholders
Comfortable working in fast-moving environments where you shape solutions and build them
Track record of driving business outcomes through technology
What we'd like to see
Computer Science, Engineering, or Math degree—or equivalent technical experience
Experience with Generative AI, Agentic AI, or conversational AI technologies
Background in product management, engineering, or technical leadership roles
Benefits
Competitive compensation with stock options
Comprehensive medical, vision, and dental insurance
401k matching
Fitness and wellness stipend
Mobile phone reimbursement
Mental well-being benefits
Professional learning and development stipend
Parental leave, including adoptive and foster parents
3 weeks paid time off (increases with tenure) and unlimited sick leave
ASAPP is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, age, or veteran status. If you have a disability and need assistance with our employment application process, please email us at careers@asapp.com to obtain assistance. #LI-SL1 #LI-Hybrid 
We may use artificial intelligence (AI) tools to support parts of the hiring process, such as reviewing applications, analyzing resumes, or assessing responses. These tools assist our recruitment team but do not replace human judgment. Final hiring decisions are ultimately made by h", "job_metadata": {"job_url": "https://jobs.lever.co/asapp-2/1fdfb7af-0676-49e4-8e2a-085bb74d2c5d"}, "status_id": "d134480385a843c1815859a871445e5a", "base_resume_pointers": null, "analyzed_requirements": null, "resume_sections": null, "validation_result": null, "generated_doc_path": "", "resume_url": "", "retry_count": 0, "error_message": "", "status": "processing"}

- Deep technical skills to understand and shape complex AI agent designs.
- Strong communication and relationship-building skills with executive stakeholders.
- Ability to work in fast-moving environments and drive business outcomes through technology.

Benefits:
- Competitive compensation with stock options; medical/vision/dental; 401k matching; wellness and learning stipends; mobile reimbursement; parental leave; 3 weeks PTO (increases with tenure) and unlimited sick leave.

attributes.mlflow.spanInputs:
[[{"content": "You are the gatekeeper agent in a job application automation workflow.

Your responsibilities:
- Detect blockers that mean we should NOT proceed (e.g., no visa sponsorship, citizenship-only roles, relocation constraints, unpaid roles).
- Summarize the job description text clearly for downstream agents.
- Identify any applicant questionnaire questions that require free-form answers.

Be conservative: if blockers are ambiguous but probable, note them and set block_application=true.", "additional_kwargs": {}, "response_metadata": {}, "type": "system", "name": null, "id": null}, {"content": "Analyze the following job posting content.

- Title: Not Specified

RAW JOB CONTENT:
Lead Customer Engineer
New York / Mountain ViewCustomer Experience – Customer Success /Full-Time /Hybrid
APPLY FOR THIS JOB
At ASAPP, our mission is simple: deliver the best AI-powered customer experience—faster than anyone else. To achieve that, we’re guided by principles that shape how we think, build, and execute. We value customer obsession, purposeful speed, ownership, and a relentless focus on outcomes. We work in tight, skilled teams, prioritize clarity over complexity, and continuously evolve through curiosity, data, and craftsmanship.

We’re seeking technologists and problem solvers who thrive in fast-paced environments, love collaborating with great talent, and approach every day like it’s Day 1. We're a globally diverse team with hubs in New York City, Mountain View, Latin America, and India—embracing both hybrid and remote work to bring the best minds together, wherever they are. If you're driven by continuous learning, rapid pivots, and the challenges of building in a high-growth startup, we’d love to talk. This is more than a job—it’s a journey.

Lead AI transformations as an L3/L4 Customer Engineer, driving GenerativeAgent implementations for the world's biggest brands. Our best Customer Engineers are relentless problem-solvers who know how to navigate the power of GenerativeAI to deliver real outcomes.

You'll own the AI agent building process during customer onboarding, partnering with junior engineers to deliver results. This role is for someone who digs into complex business problems, builds great AI solutions, and scales them to millions of users. You'll work closely with strategic customers as their AI advisor, taking a "do what it takes" approach to help them get maximum value from GenerativeAgent.

You'll partner with every team: Go-To-Market, Engineering, Product, and leadership—becoming a key source of customer insight that shapes our product roadmap.
What you'll do
Own customer implementations, bringing an entrepreneurial creativity and "do what it takes" urgency
Craft implementation strategy for complex enterprise environments
Build and optimize enterprise AI agents with customers—understanding their workflows, pain points, and goals
Work as strategic advisor with customer executive teams to define their AI roadmap
Run feedback loops with Engineering—influence features based on customer needs
Guide and mentor L1/L2 Customer Engineers in execution and customer thinking
Lead beta testing and drive adoption of new AI capabilities
What you'll need
5+ years of relevant experience (product manager, consultant, founder, engineer, etc.)
Deep technical skills—able to understand and shape complex AI agent designs
Strong communication and relationship-building skills with executive stakeholders
Comfortable working in fast-moving environments where you shape solutions and build them
Track record of driving business outcomes through technology
What we'd like to see
Computer Science, Engineering, or Math degree—or equivalent technical experience
Experience with Generative AI, Agentic AI, or conversational AI technologies
Background in product management, engineering, or technical leadership roles
Benefits
Competitive compensation with stock options
Comprehensive medical, vision, and dental insurance
401k matching
Fitness and wellness stipend
Mobile phone reimbursement
Mental well-being benefits
Professional learning and development stipend
Parental leave, including adoptive and foster parents
3 weeks paid time off (increases with tenure) and unlimited sick leave
ASAPP is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, age, or veteran status. If you have a disability and need assistance with our employment application process, please email us at careers@asapp.com to obtain assistance. #LI-SL1 #LI-Hybrid 
We may use artificial intelligence (AI) tools to support parts of the hiring process, such as reviewing applications, analyzing resumes, or assessing responses. These tools assist our recruitment team but do not replace human judgment. Final hiring decisions are ultimately made by h

Extract:
1. Whether we should block the application before proceeding.
   - Consider explicit "no sponsorship", "US citizens only", security clearance, relocation impossible, unpaid internships, or other hard blockers.
2. Sponsorship status (Yes, No, Not Specified) based on the posting.
3. Reasons for blocking, if any (each reason as a short sentence).
4. Cleaned job description text suitable for downstream analysis (remove navigation, unrelated fluff).
5. A list of application questions that the employer asks the candidate to answer (exact question text).
6. Optional notes for the human operator.

Return strict JSON:
{
  "block_application": true,
  "block_reasons": ["reason1", "reason2"],
  "sponsorship_status": "Yes/No/Not Specified",
  "clean_job_description": "cleaned description text",
  "application_questions": ["question one", "question two"],
  "notes": "optional additional context or empty string"
}

If any field is unknown, provide a sensible default (e.g., empty list, empty string, or "Not Specified").", "additional_kwargs": {}, "response_metadata": {}, "type": "human", "name": null, "id": null, "example": false}]]
